network_overview: The trace shows a healthy 4G LTE control-plane only: S1-MME SCTP associations stay up, GTP-C bearer signalling completes, and Diameter policy sessions are accepted (Result-Code 2001). No user-plane (GTP-U) or IMS traffic is present, so voice/media KPIs are not measurable.

observations.finding: All 64 Diameter transactions return 2001 (DIAMETER_SUCCESS) – PCRF/OCS policy installs are working.
S1-AP Proc-11/13 pairs exchange every 30 ms without error, indicating stable UE contexts and no radio-drop.
Zero RTP/SIP/VoLTE flows – no voice service tested in this slice.

recommendations.action: Enable GTP-U capture on S1-U or S5-U to validate bearer throughput and packet-loss KPIs.
recommendations.rationale: Control-plane success does not guarantee user-plane performance; current trace is signalling-only.

recommendations.action: Configure IMS APN in test handset and repeat trace to benchmark SIP registration and RTP MOS.
recommendations.rationale: Voice service health cannot be inferred without IMS signalling and media streams.

recommendations.action: Lower SCTP heartbeat interval from 30 s to 10 s on MME to detect eNB failure faster.
recommendations.rationale: Faster failure detection improves RRC re-establishment time during cell outages.

session_analysis.signaling_health: All S1-AP and Diameter procedures complete successfully; no re-transmissions or ABORT chunks observed.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U tunnels present – data plane not exercised in this sample.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No SIP or RTP flows – voice service absent.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Control-plane readiness (bearers established, policy installed) is verified, but user-plane and IMS layers are untested.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE
    participant eNB
    participant MME
    participant SGW
    participant PGW
    participant PCRF
    UE->>eNB: RRC Connection Request
    eNB->>MME: S1-AP Initial UE Message (Proc-11)
    MME->>SGW: GTP-C Create Session Request
    SGW->>PGW: GTP-C Create Session Request
    PGW->>PCRF: Diameter CCR-I (Cmd-318)
    PCRF-->>PGW: Diameter CCA-I (2001)
    PGW-->>SGW: Create Session Response
    SGW-->>MME: Create Session Response
    MME-->>eNB: S1-AP Initial Context Setup (Proc-13)
    eNB-->>UE: RRC Connection Reconfiguration
    Note over UE,PCRF: Bearer established, policy installed, no user-plane traffic captured
